title: Rockson1
author: Rockson1
content: As a new beginner how can I make success in life through the crypto space,today in the global world people are looking for way out of unsuccessful life,I believe as a new beginner I will be show how to make success through this trending development in the world, and to know the different between success,wealth and richness because the best live a man will lieve is when u are well to do in all areas of life I hope been here is a welcome development and step I have taken in life,kudos once more to the inventor of this great platform worldwide.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Pick your path.1. Investor: you simply just hold bitcoin. or if you want to outperform the entire market, pick the right altcoins to buy — though 95% of people will fail at this part and just lose tremendous amounts of money in the end. If you want the best risk/reward bet, just dollar-cost average bitcoin. This will only potentially boost your savings though; it won't necessarily make you rich.2. Trader: This path could be great for you in the long term, but prepare to lose a crap ton of money in the short to mid term.To be honest though, you and most people are just better off getting a job and climb the ranks, or start a business. Speculating with crypto is simply not for everyone.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: Rockson1 on February 10, 2023, 06:32:08 PMAs a new beginner how can I make success in life through the crypto spaceStart with learning, have patience and take time to acquire the knowledge, understand the process and start small and move on gradually, don't invest on shitcoins and if possible avoid alts for a beginning, be fervent with learning and try conduct personal research, know the reason why it's important to take a risk and understand it involves risk in making a profitable investments, then give it time for your invested asset to yield profit and return back the profit into the investment again following DCA pattern for accumulating Bitcoin preferably.

comments.author: Zilon
comments.body: My advice is simple. Don't try to know everything about the crypto space all at once. Find a passion and grow with it, It could be trading, investing, mining, shilling, management, farming, designing and many other things you can do for crypto projects. A developer as well won't be far from the picture. Be good with what you do, focus more on the development and in due time your skills will speak volume and your earnings will be boundless.

comments.author: mamesso
comments.body: To achieve success through the crypto space is not as easy as turning your palm, you need to have an unyielding nature and have high enthusiasm in achieving your goals. Believe me, you can achieve success in crypto by learning how to become a reliable investor/trader and always be optimistic about your abilities. The road to success is not as easy as imagined, most successful people will never be able to enjoy results without going through several failure processes.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Don't pick your path to gamble with cryptocurrency because in this volatile market, you can gamble right all times and when you lose your bet, you can lose all your capital. If you make loan to gamble, you can lose your life, your family and more precious things. Don't gamble.Be smart and only focus on investment but if you are not afford to lose your capital, don't invest too. Simply keep your fiat currency as your saving.If you invest in cryptocurrency, pick Bitcoin. Don't chase altcoins with high promised APYs because high promised APYs mean high risk of scam, bankruptcy and at the end, you are the investor who will be responsible for your capital and how your life ends.

If you want to be successful in life as an investor, you need to identify the risks associated with investing first. Especially you cannot invest directly as a fresher. Before investing, you need to know about crypto concept, market, coin popularity, development etc. If you suddenly invest in a scam project, you will face huge losses. So before investing you need to understand various strategic steps.
